html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13582024-12-16PS, CBSA
ActPreclearance Act, 2016
SubjectPreclearance in the United States Regulations
PrecisPRECLEARANCE IN THE UNITED STATES REGULATIONS in order to (1) adapt Port of Entry (POE) authorities under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and its regulations so that they can be administered at a preclearance area; (2) allow the Canada Board Services Agency to make admissibility determinations and perform immigration processing in the preclearance area or preclearance perimeter in the United States similarly to how it is performed at the POE in Canada; (3) exclude “outside of Canada” authorities from application at preclearance, normally performed at embassies/consulates abroad; and (4) adapt provisions in certain existing regulations to apply customs and plant-related legislation and regulation at preclearance to mirror POE processes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0283 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: PRECLEARANCE IN THE UNITED STATES REGULATIONS in order to (1) adapt Port of Entry (POE) authorities under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and its regulations so that they can be administered at a preclearance area; (2) allow the Canada Board Services Agency to make admissibility determinations and perform immigration processing in the preclearance area or preclearance perimeter in the United States similarly to how it is performed at the POE in Canada; (3) exclude “outside of Canada” authorities from application at preclearance, normally performed at embassies/consulates abroad; and (4) adapt provisions in certain existing regulations to apply customs and plant-related legislation and regulation at preclearance to mirror POE processes.
